document_data.name: Dog Sled
document_data.mainbody: A '''dog sled''' was a type of sled used on the [[Great Glacier]] and in [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Description: For swift transportation across the snowy plains of the Great Glacier, the dog sled offered the easiest and most efficient means of travel. This sled featured a sturdy framework crafted from wood or bone, designed to carry goods and supplies. It was equipped with a small wooden platform at one end for a person to stand on, while the other end featured a wooden lattice for attaching the dog team. The sled was fitted with runners made of wood or bone, coated with blubber for smooth gliding. Typical dimensions ranged from {{SIrange|8|12|ft|long=yes}} in length and {{SIrange|2|3|ft|long=yes}} in width. A team of six to ten dogs exhibited remarkable strength, effortlessly pulling loads of up to {{SI|1000|lb|k|long=yes}}.
document_data.Availability: * [[Frozenfar Expeditions]], an adventuring shop in [[Caer-Konig]], was known to carry dog sleds.<ref>
document_data.Notable Owners:
* On the Great Glacier, dog sleds were commonly used by the [[Ulutiun]]s to get around.
* In the tundra of Icewind Dale, dog sleds were commonly seen as a way to get between the [[Ten Towns]].<ref> The town of [[Good Mead]] in particular transported its deliveries of [[mead]] by means of dog sleds.<ref>
* Among the [[reghedmen]] of Icewind Dale, the [[Tribe of the Wolf]] were known to use dog sleds.<ref>
* The [[Sunblight]] clan of [[duergar]] owned a dog sled, though pulled by an [[ogre zombie]] instead of a dog, which they used in their robberies upon the people of Caer-Konig in [[1489 DR]].<ref>
